description.translate: The truth is yours, and only you can make it heard.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Sacédon\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7La vérité est tienne, et toi seul\"}","{\"text\":\"§7pourra la faire entendre.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7The truth is yours, and only\"}","{\"text\":\"§7you can make it heard.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HAS§a3 §7SPD§a1 §7LUC§c-1\"}"]}}
